name: Demon Might Crow
description:
This game is done for the Retro Jam 2021. It is a reimagining and adaptation of the mechanics of the DMC saga in the style of the NES console.

"Your Vital Moons have been cursed. You can use them to heal but you have a high chance of having side effects. Side effects can involve reduced sword attack, reduced health bar, inability to shoot or slowed down movement."

Controls:

Button A (Z key): Sword Attack

Button B (X key): Fire Gun

Button SELECT (Q key): Use Vital Moon

Button START (W key): Pause Game

Press START (W key) to begin playing

Attributions:

Music: Tutorial (Spacejacked OST) by sawsquarenoise (http://rolemusic.sawsquarenoise.com/)

Jam notes:

All the assets, design and code were done by me within the timespan of the Game Jam, exceptuating the music.
